message.name: INF_MANUAL_PAYMENTS_QUEUED_FOR_ALLOCATION
message.locale: This manual payment has been queued for payment allocation.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_NOT_RECORDED
message.locale: The Manual payment was not recorded. No record could be found for the nominee of this payment with nominee ID of "%1s" .

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_INVAILD_DELIVERYMETHOD
message.locale: Manual payments can be made by Cash, Check and Voucher only.
Manual payments can be made by Cash, Cheque and Voucher only.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: Cannot process a Manual Payment with an amount of zero.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_FUTUREPMTDATE
message.locale: Cannot process a Manual Payment with a Payment Date in the future.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_PMTDATEEMPTY
message.locale: Cannot process a Manual Payment with a blank Payment Date.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_ACTIVECASES_ONLY
message.locale: A Manual Payment can only be processed for an active case.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_TODATEEMPTY
message.locale: Covers Period To date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_FROMDATEEMPTY
message.locale: Covers Period From must be specified.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_FROMDATE_EARTOCASESTART
message.locale: Covers Period From date cannot be earlier than Case Start Date.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_FROMDATE_LATTOCASEEND
message.locale: Covers Period From date cannot be later than Case End Date.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_TODATE_EARTOCASESTART
message.locale: Covers Period To date cannot be earlier than Case Start Date.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_NOTVALID
message.locale: The Cover Period From and Cover Period To date must be a valid cover period.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_COVPER_TODATE_EARTOCOVERSTART
message.locale: Covers Period To date cannot be earlier than Covers Period Start Date.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_PMTDATE_BEFORE_CASESTARTDATE
message.locale: The payment cannot be associated with case %1s, as the case starts later than the payment date. Either the case needs to be modified to cover the period of this payment, or a different case must be selected.

message.name: ERR_MANUALPAYMENTS_FV_AMOUNT_POSITIVE
message.locale: The Manual Payment amount must be greater than zero.
